entries.accept_hall: Transfer PA Hall Lots to Myself
entries.accept_pa_hall_p: The current owner of this PA hall has not logged in for 28 days. As guild leader, you may transfer ownership of the PA hall to yourself. You must have enough lots free to accept PA Hall ownership. Once you own the PA hall you may transfer it to another owner if you so desire.
entries.accept_target: %TU has accepted you for membership in %TT.
entries.allegiance_self: You have declared your support for %TU as leader of %TT.
entries.allegiance_unchanged_self: That person was not found.  Your allegiance remains unchanged.
entries.already_leader: You are already the guild leader.
entries.closed_elections_email_body: Your guild's election for a new guild leader has been closed by the current guild leader.
entries.create_abbrev_prompt: Enter an abbreviation for your guild.  Guild abbreviations must be 1-5 characters in length.
entries.create_fail_abbrev_bad_length: Guild abbreviations must be 1-5 characters in length.
entries.create_fail_abbrev_in_use: That guild abbreviation is already in use.
entries.create_fail_abbrev_not_allowed: That guild abbreviation is not allowed.
entries.create_fail_in_guild: You cannot create a guild while already in a guild.
entries.create_fail_name_bad_length: Guild names must be 1-25 characters in length.
entries.create_fail_name_in_use: That guild name is already in use.
entries.create_fail_name_not_allowed: That guild name is not allowed.
entries.create_name_prompt: Enter a name for your guild.  Guild names must be between 1 and 25 characters in length.
entries.datapad_terminal_created: A guild terminal has been added to your datapad.
entries.disband_prompt: Are you sure you wish to disband your guild?
entries.enemies_prompt: This is the guild war status for your guild.  Guilds are preceded with '=', '>', or '<', to signify guilds you are mutually at war with, guilds you have declared war on which have not declared war on you in return, and guilds which have declared war on you but you have not declared war on in return, respectively.  If you have permission for declaring war, you may perform the following operations.  To cancel a declaration of war, select a guild from the list which you are currently at war with and press 'Ok'.  To declare war in return on a guild which has declared war on you, select them in the list and press 'Ok'.  To declare war on a guild which has not declared war on you, select 'Add New Enemy' and press Ok.  For guilds that you are mutually at war with, the kill statistics for each guild war is displayed.  For guilds that you are mutually at war with and guilds which have declared war on you but you have not declared war on in return, the number of members in the guild who are enabled for guild war PvP is displayed in parenthesis after the guild abbreviation.
entries.generic_fail_no_permission: You do not have permission to perform that operation.
entries.guild_no_permission_operation: You do not have permission to perform this action.
entries.kick_prompt: Are you sure you want to kick %TU out of the guild?
entries.leader_standings_d: A complete list of current guild leader candidates and their vote standing follows.
entries.leader_vote_d: Select your desired candidate from the list below. You may change your vote at any time.
entries.leave_fail_leader_tried_to_leave: As the PA Leader, you may not remove yourself from the group until leadership has been transferred to another PA member.
entries.load_cartridge_prompt: Are you sure you wish to load the cartridge? Doing so will destroy your present Data-Screen. You will then only be able to display the newly loaded Data-Screen, until a new cartridge is loaded.
entries.make_leader_d: You are about to transfer leadership of this Player Association! Once you take this action, you will be made a normal member and your leader permissions will be revoked. Enter the name of the person you wish to give leadership to. This person must be a guild member and must be standing near you.
entries.make_leader_p: The leader of this PA wants to transfer leadership to you. Do you accept? Once you accept, the current Player Association Data-Screen will be destroyed. But as the new leader of your PA you can re-order one from your remote Player Association Access Device.
entries.member_options_prompt: Select an operation from the list to perform on %TU and press Ok.  If the guild war exclusive list is not empty, *only* those guild members will be flagged for guild war PvP.  If the guild war exclusive list is empty, all guild members will be flagged for guild war PvP *except* those on the guild war exemption list.
entries.member_rank_prompt: Select ranks from the list to give them to %TU and press Ok.  WARNING: There is a delay before the rank is set, so this menu will not update immediately.
entries.members_filter_prompt: Choose how you would like the member display filtered.
entries.members_name_prompt: Enter the name you wish to search for.
entries.members_prompt: These are the current members of the guild.  To perform an operation on a guild member, select them in the list and press Ok.
entries.members_show_prompt: These are the current members of the guild.
entries.ml_fail: Unable to find a member of the PA with that name.
entries.ml_no_lots_free: That person does not have enough free lots to own the PA hall. PA hall ownership is a requirement to be guild leader.
entries.ml_not_loaded: That person is not loaded or is too far away.
entries.ml_rejected: That player does not want to become guild leader.
entries.ml_success: PA leadership transferred. You are now a normal member of the PA.
entries.ml_trial: Trial accounts can't own PAs or structures.
entries.ml_you_are_leader: You have been made leader of your PA!
entries.namechange_abbrev_prompt: Enter the abbreviation for your guild's new name.  Guild abbreviations must be between 1 and 5 characters in length.
entries.namechange_fail_abbrev_bad_length: Guild abbreviations must be 1-5 characters in length.
entries.namechange_fail_abbrev_not_allowed: That guild abbreviation is not allowed.
entries.namechange_fail_name_bad_length: Guild names must be 1-25 characters in length.
entries.namechange_fail_name_not_allowed: That guild name is not allowed.
entries.namechange_name_prompt: Enter the name to which you wish to change your guild.  Guild names must be between 1 and 25 characters.  Name changes take approximately 7 days to take effect.
entries.namechange_self: You have set your guild's name and abbreviation to be changed to '%TU' and '%TT' respectively.  The change will take place in approximately 7 days, if there are no conflicts at that time.
entries.need_accept_hall: You are PA leader, but you do not own the PA hall. You must accept ownership of the PA hall before you or your PA members can use the management terminal. You must have 5 lots free to accept ownership of the PA hall. Select "Accept PA Hall Lots" to take ownership of the PA hall structure.
entries.no_back_further: This is the beginning of the list.
entries.no_destroy_remote: You cannot destroy the remote  Player Association Access Device.
entries.no_free_trial: Free Trial Accounts cannot create Player Asssociations.
entries.no_lots: You don't have enough lots free to take over the PA hall. You need to have 5 free lots.
entries.no_titles_in_guild: No one has any titles in your Player Association.
entries.open_elections_absent_email_body: Your guild leader has not logged in for an extended period of time. In order to enable your guild to continue to operate efficiently, the guild leader voting system has been enabled. You may vote at the guild terminal in your PA Hall. If you are a full member of the guild, you may opt to run for the position of guild leader by registering at the guild terminal.  A new guild leader will be elected in exactly two weeks. The guild member with the most votes at that time will become guild leader.
entries.open_elections_email_body: Your guild has started an election for a new guild leader! You may vote for a new leader through your datapad's player associatoin device. If you are a full member of the guild, you may opt to run for the position of guild leader by registering on your datapad's player association device.  A new guild leader will be elected in exactly one week. The guild member with the most votes at that time will become guild leader.  Afterwards, a grace period of two weeks will occur where no elections may be started.
entries.pa_owner_now: You are now the owner of this PA Hall.
entries.permissions_prompt: These are the current permissions set for %TU.  Permissions preceded by '+' are currently allowed, and those preceded by '-' are not.  Select a permission and press Ok to toggle it.
entries.public_election_body: The leader elections for %TT have been held.  The incumbent guild leader has lost the election!  The new guild leader is %TO.  Please congratulate the new guild leader!  The voting system will now be disabled. The new leader can enable it if they wish to run new elections.
entries.public_election_inc_body: The elections for %TT have been held.  The incumbent guild leader is victorious!  Please congratulate %TO on retaining their office.  The voting system will now be disabled. The new leader can enable it if they wish to run new elections.
entries.sponsor_fail_full: No more members may be sponsored, as the guild is already full.
entries.sponsor_not_found: The specified person to sponsor could not be found.
entries.sponsor_prompt: Enter the name of the person to sponsor for membership. The person needs to be online.
entries.sponsor_target: %TU has sponsored you for membership in %TT.
entries.sponsor_verify_prompt: %TU wishes to sponsor you for membership in %TT.  Accepting this will cancel your sponsorship for any other guilds.  Do you accept sponsorship?
entries.sponsored_options_prompt: Sponsored for membership: %TU. You may accept them into the guild, decline their membership, or cancel to leave them unchanged for now.
entries.sponsored_prompt: These are the people currently sponsored for membership in the guild.  If you have permission, you may select them from the list and press Ok to accept or decline their membership.
entries.terminal_locked: The PA leader does not own the PA hall. The PA terminal may not be used until the PA leader accepts hall ownership.
entries.title: Set Title
entries.title_fail_bad_length: Guild member titles may be at most 25 characters in length.
entries.title_prompt: Enter a title to set for %TU.
entries.title_target: %TU has set your guild title to '%TT'.
entries.vote_abstain: You have chosen to abstain in this election.
entries.vote_elections_closed: Elections for the position of guild leader are now closed.
entries.vote_elections_open: Elections for the position of guild leader are now open.
entries.vote_no_candidates: No one has registered to run for guild leader.
entries.vote_not_registered: You aren't registered to run, so you can't unregister.
entries.vote_placed: Your vote for %TO has been recorded.
entries.vote_register_congrats: Congratulations, you are now listed on the ballot for the position of guild leader!
entries.vote_register_dupe: You are already registered for the guild leader election.
entries.vote_unregistered: You have unregistered from the race.
entries.war_enemy_name_prompt: Enter a guild name or abbreviation to declare war upon.
entries.war_fail_no_such_guild: No guild found by that name.
entries.menu_list_of_guild_wars_active: Active Guild Wars With At Least 1 Kill
entries.menu_list_of_guild_wars_inactive: 100 Most Recently Ended Guild Wars With At Least 1 Kill
entries.sid_guild_war_exclusion_toggled: You have toggled the war exemption status for %TT.  It may take a couple minutes to update on the guild roster.
entries.sid_guild_war_inclusion_toggled: You have toggled the war inclusion status for %TT.  It may take a couple minutes to update on the guild roster.
entries.guild_rank_summary_prompt: The rank summary shows how many ranks have been awarded to guild members.  Double-click on a row to turn on and off showing the rank in the rank viewer.  The maximum showable ranks are 20 at a time.
entries.sid_completed_elections_email_body_leade: Election results for your guild are in!  Your guild leader did not change.  You can view your guild roster through your datapad's player association device.  The next election may be started in two weeks.
Election results for your guild are in!  Your guild has a new leader.  You can view your guild roster through your datapad's player association device.  The next election may be started in two weeks.
entries.mail_body_guild_faction_changed: Guild %TU has changed its factional alignment from %TT to %TO.
entries.mail_body_guild_gcw_defender_region_chan: Guild %TU has changed its GCW defender region from %TT to %TO.
